segments.text: You should save some money on parking here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I don ’ t have to pay for a space on the street .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? How long did it take you to find a spot yesterday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , last night it took me half an hour to find a spot when I came home from work .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You get home late , don ’ t you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , around seven . Most of the street parking is gone by then .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ah , well . You can ’ t have everything .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . I can live with it . It ’ s great to be living alone .
segments.speaker: S2
